original_title: Λούης - Επτά φορές να πέφτεις, οκτώ να σηκώνεσαι
overview: A documentary film focusing on Leonidas Lambrou, a businessman born and raised in the city of Nafplio,an 86 years old ordinary man with an extraordinary life.
title: Louis - Seven times you fall, eight times you get back on the horse
